ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity has a Closed Lost Reason as "Renewal admin issue" and sub reason as "Consolidated Renewal", it is required to have an Id on the Consolidated Renewal Opportunity Id field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Closed_Lost_Renewal_Reason__c, 'Renewal admin issue'), ISPICKVAL(Closed_Lost_Renewal_Sub_reason__c, 'Consolidated Renewal'), ISBLANK(Consolidated_Renewal_Opportunity_Id__c), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator API', $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing Consolidated Renewal Opportunity link. Please click on "Create Related Opportunity" and select "Consolidated Renewal" before trying again.
